Copy Express VI Page (Express VI Creator Wizard)

Requires: Base Development System

Click the New button on the Create or Edit Express VI dialog box to display the Express VI Creator wizard. Select the Create from an Express VI option and click the Next button to display this page.

Use this page to specify the Express VI on which you want to base a new Express VI.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Express VIs—Displays a list of Express VIs on the local computer that you can copy to create a new Express VI. You also can browse to other Express VIs on the computer or on the network.
  • Description—Displays a description of the Express VI you select in the Express VIs tree.
  • Path—Displays the directory path to the Express VI you select in the Express VIs tree.
